title: 03/25/21 DPS Hour 3 Frank Isola
itunes:title: 03/25/21 DPS Hour 3 Frank Isola
description:
Frank Isola talks to Dan about the NBA trade deadline. Frank says that Lonzo Ball is being traded because the Pelicans don't want to pay Ball.
